amendment.description: To prevent the use of additional Internal Revenue Service Funds from being used for audits of taxpayers with taxable incomes below $400,000 in order to protect low- and middle-income earning American taxpayers from an onslaught of audits from an army of new Internal Revenue Service auditors funded by an unprecedented, nearly $80,000,000,000, infusion of new funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5404 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 296.
